config.defaultValue: q.player.data.cidian_defeated = 1; q.player.save_data(); q.run_command('tellraw ' + q.player.username + ' ["",{"text":"[' + q.npc.name + '] That was an amazing battle, ' + q.player.username + '"}]'); q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function cobbletrainers:beat_trainer')
